analyzed: tattvamīmāṃsā
sukha eka viṣayā bhūtānām pravṛttiḥ
sukham ca sati duḥkha hetau asambhavati

original: ato bhavati duḥkhābhighātake jijñāsā sā ca tattvajñānāt /
analyzed: atas bhavati duḥkha abhighātake jijñāsā sā ca tattva jñānāt
atas tattvam atra nirūpyate
nanu trividham duḥkham ādhyātmikam ādhidaivikam ādhibhautikam ca
tatra ādhyātmikam dvividham śārīram mānasam ca
śārīram vāta pitta śleṣmaṇām vaiṣamya nimittam mānasam kāma krodha ādi nibandhanam
ādhibhautikam mānuṣa paśu pakṣi ādi nimittam
ādhidaivikam yakṣa rākṣasa graha ādi āveśa nibandhanam
teṣām ca eṣām laukikaiḥ eva upāyaiḥ pratīkāraḥ śakyate
tathā hi śārīrasya auṣadha ādibhiḥ mānasasya manojña strī pāna bhojana vastra alaṅkāra ādi prāptyā
ādhibhautikasya nīti śāstra abhyāsa su sthāna upaveśa ādinā ādhidaivikasya maṇi mantra ādi upayogena iti
sukaraḥ upāyaḥ tattva jñānam tu aneka janma rapara abhyāsa sādhyam
tathā ca laukikānām ābhāṇakaḥ

original: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
analyzed: akke ced madhu vindeta kimartham parvatam vrajet

original: iṣṭasyārthasya saṃprāptau ko vidvān yatnamācaret // iti /
analyzed: iṣṭasya arthasya saṃprāptau kaḥ vidvān yatnam ācaret iti
akke gṛha koṇe
mā evam
na hi etaiḥ upāyaiḥ sarvam eva duḥkham nivartate
nivṛttam punar na utpadyate

original: yadyapi śāstrīyamapi ahorātramāsavarṣādisādhyamupāyāntaraṃ sukaraṃ śrūyate apāma somamamṛtā abhūmeti tathāpi etadapi laukikopāyatulyameva /
analyzed: yadi api śāstrīyam api ahar rātra māsa varṣa ādi sādhyam upāya antaram sukaram śrūyate apāma somam amṛtāḥ abhūma iti tathā api etat api laukika upāya tulyam eva
tathā hi soma yāgaḥ paśu vadha ādi sādhana tvāt na viśeṣataḥ śuddhaḥ

original: akṛte hi tadvadhaprāyaścitte svargādigatyanantaraṃ paripacyate eva tadduḥkham /
analyzed: a kṛte hi tad vadha prāyaścitte svarga ādi gati anantaram paripacyate eva tat duḥkham

original: na ca na hiṃsyātsarvābhūtānīti sāmānyaśāstrabhya viśeṣaśāstreṇāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhetetyanena
analyzed: na ca na hiṃsyāt sarva abhūtāni iti viśeṣa śāstreṇa agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabheta iti anena

original: bādhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ bhinnaviṣayatvena bādhyabādhakabhāvāsambhavāt agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheteti
analyzed: bādhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ bhinna viṣaya tvena bādhya bādhaka bhāva asambhavāt agnīṣomīyam paśum ālabheta iti

original: vākyena hi vadhasya kratūpakārakatvameva bodhyate na tu puruṣapratyavāyābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: vākyena hi vadhasya kratu upakāraka tvam eva bodhyate na tu puruṣa pratyavāya abhāvaḥ
evam svarga ādeḥ anitya tvam api sattve sati kārya tvāt anumīyate
tathā ca śrutiḥ api

original: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaikenāmṛtatvamānaśuḥ /
analyzed: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgena ekena amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo viśanti //
analyzed: pareṇa nākam nihitam guhāyām vibhrājate yat yatayaḥ viśanti

original: karmaṇā jyotiṣṭomādinā prajayā putreṇa dhanena devatājñānena putreṇāyaṃ loko jeyo
analyzed: karmaṇā jyotiṣṭoma ādinā prajayā putreṇa dhanena devatā jñānena putreṇa ayam lokaḥ jeyaḥ

original: vidyayā devalokaḥ karmaṇā pitṛloka iti śrutyantarāt ebhiḥ pitrādilokasyaiva prāptirnāmṛtatvasyeti bhāvaha /
analyzed: vidyayā deva lokaḥ karmaṇā pitṛ lokaḥ iti śruti antarāt ebhiḥ pitṛ ādi lokasya eva prāptiḥ na amṛta tvasya iti bhāvaha
tarhi katham amṛta tvam iti atas āha tyāgena iti
sarva karma saṃnyāsa sādhya jñānena iti arthaḥ

original: tadamṛtatvaṃ svarga eva cettattrāha pareṇa nākamiti /
analyzed: tat amṛta tvam svarge eva ced tat trāha pareṇa nākam iti

original: tarhi dūrasthatvānna prāpyamiti cettatrāha nihitaṃ guhāyāmiti /
analyzed: tarhi dūra stha tvāt na prāpyam iti ced tatra āha nihitam guhāyām iti

original: taccāsannatvātpṛthak janairapi labhyamiti cettatrāha yadyataya iti /
analyzed: tat ca āsanna tvāt pṛthak janaiḥ api labhyam iti ced tatra āha yat yatayaḥ iti
adūra bhūtam api avivekinām dūra bhūtam eva
tathā śruti antaram
karmaṇā mṛtyum ṛṣayaḥ niṣeduḥ prajāvantaḥ dvaviṇam īhamānāḥ

original: tathā 'pare ṛṣayo ye manīṣiṇaḥ paraṃ karmabhyo 'mṛtatvamānaśuriti //
analyzed: tathā pare ṛṣayaḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ param karmabhyaḥ mṛta tvam ānaśuḥ iti
apāma somam amṛtāḥ abhūma iti amṛta tva abhidhānam tu cira sthiti abhiprāyam

original: yadāhuḥ ābhūtasamplavaṃ sthānamamṛtatvaṃ hi bhāṣyate iti /
analyzed: yat āhuḥ ābhūtasamplavam sthānam amṛta tvam hi bhāṣyate iti
tat etat sarvam abhipretya uktam śāstra kṛdbhiḥ tad biparītaḥ śreyān vyakta avyakta jña vijñānāt
asya arthaḥ
tasmāt soma pāna ādeḥ aviśuddhāt anityāt viparītaḥ hiṃsā ādi asaṅkarāt viśuddhaḥ upāyaḥ śreyān
sa ca katham

original: vyaktasya kāryajātasya tatkāraṇasya avyaktasya pradhānasya tābhyāṃ parasya tasyātmanaśca vivekena jñānādbhavati iti /
analyzed: vyaktasya kārya jātasya tad kāraṇasya avyaktasya pradhānasya tābhyām parasya tasya ātmanaḥ ca vivekena jñānāt bhavati iti
na ca viveka utpanna phalasya api kārya tvāt anitya tvam śaṃkyam
bhāva rūpa kāryasya eva anitya tvāt duḥkha dhvaṃsasya tu kārya tve pi nitya tvāt
atha atra śāstre catasraḥ vidhāḥ
prakṛtiḥ vikṛtiḥ ubhayam anubhayam ca iti

original: tatra jagato mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ na vikāraḥ kintu prakṛtireva prakarotīti prakṛtiḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthā /
analyzed: tatra jagataḥ mūla kāraṇa bhūtam pradhānam na vikāraḥ kintu prakṛtiḥ eva prakaroti iti prakṛtiḥ sattva rajaḥ tamasām sāmya avasthā
asyāḥ ca mūla antaram anavasthā bhayāt na asti iti mūlaprakṛtiḥ iti ucyate
sā eva śāstra antare avidyā māyā śabdena ucyate

original: etadevāvyaktaṃ sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ vaiṣamye sati vyaktamityucyate /
analyzed: etat eva avyaktam sattva ādīnām guṇānām vaiṣamye sati vyaktam iti ucyate
yathā hi samudra jale calita acalita pradeśāḥ
evam triguṇa ātmike pradhāne pariṇāmavān tad vidhuraḥ ca pradeśaḥ

original: tatra prakṛtivikāreṣu madhye ādyo vikāro mahānityucyate sa etadbuddhilakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tatra prakṛti vikāreṣu madhye ādyaḥ vikāraḥ mahān iti ucyate saḥ etad buddhi lakṣaṇaḥ
saḥ āha mahān sāttvikaḥ rājasaḥ tāmasaḥ ca iti trividhaḥ
buddheḥ tu prathamaḥ vikāraḥ haṅkāraḥ
ete ca mahat ādayaḥ prakṛtayaḥ vikṛtayaḥ ca
tathā hi mahat tattvam ahaṅkārasya prakṛtiḥ vikṛtiḥ ca mūlaprakṛteḥ

original: ayaṃ hi kramaḥ prakṛtermahān mahato 'haṅkāraṃ ahaṅkārātpañca tanmātrāḥ tābhyaḥ pañca
analyzed: ayam hi kramaḥ prakṛteḥ mahān mahataḥ haṅkāram ahaṅkārāt pañca tanmātrāḥ tābhyaḥ pañca

original: bhūtāni tanmātrāṇi punaḥ kṣīradadhyorantarāle kalalapariṇāmātpariṇatāni sūkṣmabhūtāni
analyzed: bhūtāni tanmātrāṇi punar kṣīra dadhyoḥ antarāle kalala pariṇāmāt pariṇatāni sūkṣma bhūtāni
kusuma saurabhyena sūkṣma sthūla tayā upalakṣyamāṇam guṇa vaiṣamyam eva tanmātra śabdena
bhūta śabdena ca ucyate

original: pañca bhūtāni ekādaśendriyāṇi ceti eṣa ṣoḍaśako gaṇastu vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: pañca bhūtāni ekādaśa indriyāṇi ca iti eṣa ṣoḍaśakaḥ gaṇaḥ tu vikāraḥ eva na prakṛtiḥ
puruṣaḥ tu ātmā na prakṛtiḥ na vikṛtiḥ
tat etat āhuḥ
mūlaprakṛtiḥ avikṛtiḥ mahat ādyāḥ prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ sapta

original: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // iti /
analyzed: ṣoḍaśakaḥ tu vikāraḥ na prakṛtiḥ na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ iti
atha śāstra paribhāṣā
dṛṣṭam anumānam āpta vacanam ca iti trividham laukikam pramāṇam

original: ārṣaṃ tu vijñānaṃ yogināmeveti tadatra noktam /
analyzed: ārṣam tu vijñānam yoginām eva iti tat atra na uktam
tatra pṛthivī ādayaḥ sukha ādayaḥ ca asmat ādīnām viṣayāḥ

original: tanmātralakṣaṇāstu devānāṃ yogināṃ ca viṣayā na tvasmadādīnām teṣāṃ cendriyaiḥ sambandhaḥ sannikarṣaḥ /
analyzed: tanmātra lakṣaṇāḥ tu devānām yoginām ca viṣayāḥ na tu asmat ādīnām teṣām ca indriyaiḥ sambandhaḥ sannikarṣaḥ

original: evañca viṣayasambaddhendriyāśrito yo buddhidharmo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa eva pramāṇam /
analyzed: evam ca viṣaya sambaddha indriya āśritaḥ yaḥ buddhi dharmaḥ dhī avasāyaḥ saḥ eva pramāṇam
ayam hi kramaḥ

original: viṣayasambaddhānāmindriyāṇāṃ vṛttau satyāṃ buddhestu tamobhibhave sati yaḥ sattvasamudrekaḥ so 'dhyavasāya iti jñānamiti vṛttiścākhyāyate /
analyzed: viṣaya sambaddhānām indriyāṇām vṛttau satyām buddheḥ tu tamaḥ abhibhave sati yaḥ sattva samudrekaḥ saḥ dhī avasāyaḥ iti jñānam iti vṛttiḥ ca ākhyāyate
tat idam pratyakṣa pramāṇam
asmāt ca yaḥ cetanā śakteḥ anugrahaḥ tad phalam pramā bodhaḥ
buddhi sattvam hi prākṛta tvāt acetanam iti tadīyaḥ dhyavasāyaḥ pi acetanaḥ ghaṭa ādi vat
evam hi buddhi sattvasya pariṇāma bhedāḥ sukha ādayaḥ pi acetanāḥ
puruṣaḥ tu sukha ādi ananuṣaṅgī cetanaḥ
saḥ yam buddhi tattva varttinā jñāna sukha ādinā tad pratibimbitaḥ buddhi sādṛśya prāptyā

original: jñānasukhādimāniva bhavati citisādṛśyaprāptyā ca acetanāpi buddhistadavadhyavasāyaśca
analyzed: jñāna sukha ādimān iva bhavati citi sādṛśya prāptyā ca acetanā api buddhiḥ tad avadhya vasāyaḥ ca
cetanaḥ iva bhavati
cārvākāḥ tu pratyakṣa anyat na mānam iti vadanti
tad mate saṃdigdha viparyayaḥ tu puruṣa bodhanam na upapadyeta

original: nahi puruṣāntaragataḥ saṃśayaḥ anumānaṃ kathanaṃ vinā vā jñātuṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: nahi puruṣa antara gataḥ saṃśayaḥ anumānam kathanam vinā vā jñātum śakyaḥ
pramāṇa antarāṇi tu atra eva antarbhavanti

original: tathāhi upamānaṃ tāvat gosadṛśo gavaya iti vākyaṃ tajjanito bodho śabda evāntarbhavati cakṣuḥsaṃnikṛṣṭasya gavayasya yat gosādṛśyajñānaṃ tatpratyakṣameva
analyzed: tathā hi upamānam tāvat go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti vākyam tad janitaḥ śabdaḥ eva antarbhavati cakṣuḥ saṃnikṛṣṭasya gavayasya yat go sādṛśya jñānam tat pratyakṣam eva

original: evaṃ jīvataścaitrasya gṛhāsattvena bahiḥsattvakalpanamarthāpattiḥ sāpyanumāna evāntarbhavati /
analyzed: evam jīvataḥ caitrasya gṛha asattvena bahis sattva kalpanam arthāpattiḥ sā api anumāne eva antarbhavati
vimataḥ caitraḥ bahis bhavitum arhati gṛheṣu a vidyamāna tvāt

original: yadā tvavyāpakaḥ sannekatrāsti tadānyatra nāsti yadaikatra nāsti tadānyatrāstīti vyāptigrahāt /
analyzed: yadā tu avyāpakaḥ san ekatra asti tadā anyatra na asti yadā ekatra na asti tadā anyatra asti iti vyāpti grahāt

original: evamiha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti aitihyaṃ na pramāṇamanirdiṣṭasvavaktṛkatvena sandehāt /
analyzed: evam iha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti aitihyam na pramāṇam anirdiṣṭa sva vaktṛka tvena sandehāt
āpta ukta tva niścaye tu āgamaḥ eva
evam abhāvaḥ na anupalabdhi gamyaḥ kintu pratyakṣaḥ eva

original: na hi bhūtalasya kaivalyalakṣaṇātpariṇāmaviśeṣādanyo ghaṭābhāvo nāma /
analyzed: na hi bhū talasya kaivalya lakṣaṇāt pariṇāma viśeṣāt anyaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ nāma

original: sarva eva hi bhāvāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāminaḥ sa ca pariṇāmabheda aindriyaka evetyalam /
analyzed: sarve eva hi bhāvāḥ pratikṣaṇam pariṇāminaḥ sa ca pariṇāma bhedaḥ aindriyakaḥ eva iti alam
tatra sūkṣmasya avyaktasya apratyakṣa tve pi mahat ādi kāryeṇa tat anumīyate
tathā hi sat eva kāryam kāraṇa vyāpārāt prāk api

original: asato hi sattvaṃ duṣkaram nahi nīlaṃ śilpisahasreṇāpi pītaṃ śakyaṃ kartum /
analyzed: asataḥ hi sattvam duṣkaram nahi nīlam śilpi sahasreṇa api pītam śakyam kartum

original: kintu tileṣu pīḍanena tailasyeva āvirbhāvamātramutpattiḥ tirobhāva eva vināśaḥ /
analyzed: kintu tileṣu pīḍanena tailasya iva āvirbhāva mātram utpattiḥ tirobhāvaḥ eva vināśaḥ

original: kiñcāsambaddhasyāpi kāryasya janyatve sambaddhatvāviśeṣātsarvaṃ kāryaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti kāryasambaddhasyaiva kāraṇasya janakatvamupeyam /
analyzed: kiñca asambaddhasya api kāryasya janya tve sambaddha tva aviśeṣāt sarvam kāryam sarvasmāt bhavet iti kārya sambaddhasya eva kāraṇasya janaka tvam upeyam
na ca sat asatoḥ sambandhaḥ asti iti satkāryam

original: kiñca tantudharmatvāttantūpādeyatvācca na paṭasyārthāntaratvam yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭapaṭau /
analyzed: kiñca tantu dharma tvāt tantu upādeya tvāt ca na paṭasya artha antara tvam yat na evam tat na evam yathā ghaṭa paṭau

original: tathā arthāntarayoḥ saṃyogo vā bhavati yathā kuṃḍabadarayoḥ aprāptirvā bhavati himavadvindhyayoḥ /
analyzed: tathā artha antarayoḥ saṃyogaḥ vā bhavati yathā kuṃḍa badarayoḥ aprāptiḥ vā bhavati himavat vindhyayoḥ

original: tasmādyathā kūrmaśarīre kūrmāṅgāni niviśamānāni tirobhavanti na tatra tānyutpadyante na vinaśyanti vā evamekasmātsuvarṇādermukuṭādiprādurbhāva  #
analyzed: tasmāt yathā kūrma śarīre kūrma aṅgāni niviśamānāni tirobhavanti na tatra tāni utpadyante na vinaśyanti vā evam ekasmāt suvarṇa ādeḥ mukuṭa ādi prādurbhāva
eva utpattiḥ

original: evañca mahadādikāryaṃ pradhāne 'bhiniviśate avyaktaṃ bhavati iti /
analyzed: evam ca mahat ādi kāryam pradhāne bhiniviśate avyaktam bhavati iti

original: kāraṇe sattyeva kāryasya vibhāgāvibhāgābhyāmavyaktaṃ kāraṇamastīti gamyate /
analyzed: kāraṇe satti eva kāryasya vibhāga avibhāgābhyām avyaktam kāraṇam asti iti gamyate

original: taccāvyaktaṃ nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ vyāpnoti tathā niḥkriyaṃ kvacidapyanāśritañca evaṃ niravayavaṃ svatantraṃ ca /
analyzed: tat ca avyaktam nityam vyāpakam ca sarvam kāryam vyāpnoti tathā niḥkriyam kvacid api anāśritam ca evam niravayavam svatantram ca
etad viparītam tu vyaktam

original: evaṃ vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhamoharūpaguṇatrayānvitamacetanaṃ prasavadharmi ca tadviparītaḥ puruṣaḥ sukhādayaśca guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpāḥ
analyzed: evam vyaktam avyaktam ca sukha duḥkha moha rūpa guṇatraya anvitam acetanam prasava dharmi ca tad viparītaḥ puruṣaḥ sukha ādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ rūpāḥ

original: sattvasya prayojanaṃ tu prakāśaḥ rajastu tasya pravartakaṃ tamastu niyāmakaṃ yadi hi tamasā guruṇā niyamyeta tadā rajaḥ laghu sattvaṃ sarvatra  #
analyzed: sattvasya prayojanam tu prakāśaḥ rajaḥ tu tasya pravartakam tamaḥ tu niyāmakam yadi hi tamasā guruṇā niyamyeta tadā rajaḥ laghu sattvam sarvatra
pravarttayet

original: yathā sattvaṃ rajastamasī abhibhūya śāntā vṛttimadhigacchati yathā ca rajaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya ghorāṃ tathā tamaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya  #
analyzed: yathā sattvam rajaḥ tamasī abhibhūya śāntā vṛttim adhigacchati yathā ca rajaḥ sattva rajasī abhibhūya ghorām tathā tamaḥ sattva rajasī abhibhūya
mūḍhām iti

original: yadyapyete parasparaṃ virodhaśīlāḥ tathāpi yathā vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ parasparavirodhinaḥ śarīradhāraṇarūpaikakāryakāriṇaḥ evamete 'pi /
analyzed: yadi api ete parasparam virodha śīlāḥ tathā api yathā vāta pitta śleṣmāṇaḥ paraspara virodhinaḥ śarīra dhāraṇa rūpa eka kārya kāriṇaḥ evam ete pi

original: evaṃ sukhahetutvātsattvaṃ sukhātmakaṃ duḥkhahetutvādduḥkhātmakaṃ rajaḥ yanmohakaṃ tattamaḥ /
analyzed: evam sukha hetu tvāt sattvam sukha ātmakam duḥkha hetu tvāt duḥkha ātmakam rajaḥ yat mohakam tat tamaḥ

original: te ca sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ parasparavirodhinaḥ svānurūpāṇyeva parasparaṃ viruddhāni sukhaduḥkhamohātmakāni nimittāni kalpayanti /
analyzed: te ca sukha duḥkha mohāḥ paraspara virodhinaḥ sva anurūpāṇi eva parasparam viruddhāni sukha duḥkha moha ātmakāni nimittāni kalpayanti

original: tathāhi ekaiva strī svāminaṃ prati sukharūpasadbhāvāttaṃ sukhākaroti sapatnīstu duḥkhākaroti evamatrāpyekasyāpi nimittabhedādbhedaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi ekā eva strī svāminam prati sukha rūpa sadbhāvāt tam sukhākaroti sapatnīḥ tu duḥkhākaroti evam atra api ekasya api nimitta bhedāt bhedaḥ
sukha prakāśa lāghavaiḥ tu parasparam avirodhāt na nimitta bhedāḥ kalpyante

original: sargādau tu pariṇāmasvabhāvā guṇāḥ kṣaṇamapyapariṇamayya na tiṣṭhantīti sattvaṃ sattvarūpatayā rajo rajorūpatayā tamastamorūpatayā pravarttate
analyzed: sarga ādau tu pariṇāma svabhāvāḥ guṇāḥ kṣaṇam api a pariṇamayya na tiṣṭhanti iti sattvam sattva rūpatayā rajaḥ rajaḥ rūpatayā tamaḥ tamaḥ rūpatayā pravarttate

original: yathāhi ghanavimuktajalānāṃ jambīrakaravīranārikerādyāśrayabhedādasti bhedaḥ evamekarūpāṇāmapi guṇānāṃ pratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣādanekarūpatā /
analyzed: yathā hi ghana vimukta jalānām jambīra karavīra nārikera ādi āśraya bhedāt asti bhedaḥ evam eka rūpāṇām api guṇānām prati guṇa āśraya viśeṣāt aneka rūpa tā
ātmā tu vyakta avyakta saṃghāta bhinnaḥ
para arthaḥ hi saṃghātaḥ bhavati
yathā śayana āsana ādayaḥ saṃghātāḥ śarīra arthāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ

original: kiñca yathā rathādi yaṃtryādinādhiṣṭhitaṃ evaṃ triguṇātmakamapi pareṇa kenacidadhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: kiñca yathā ratha ādi yaṃtrī ādinā adhiṣṭhitam evam triguṇa ātmakam api pareṇa kenacid adhiṣṭhīyamānam yuktam

original: sa cātmā pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ na hyekasmin sukhini sarve sukhinaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca ātmā pratiśarīram bhinnaḥ na hi ekasmin sukhini sarve sukhinaḥ

original: sa cāyaṃ puruṣaḥ sākṣī ca bhavati prakṛtirhi svaviṣayacaritaṃ puruṣāya pradarśayati /
analyzed: sa ca ayam puruṣaḥ sākṣī ca bhavati prakṛtiḥ hi sva viṣaya caritam puruṣāya pradarśayati

original: tathāhi loke arthipratyarthinau vivādaviṣayaṃ sākṣiṇe darśayataḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi loke arthi pratyarthinau vivāda viṣayam sākṣiṇe darśayataḥ
evam ca ayam draṣṭā api bhavati
tathā a traiguṇāt asya kaivalyam ca dharmaḥ
ātyantikaḥ hi duḥkha traya abhāvaḥ kaivalyam

original: ata evātriguṇatvānmadhyastho 'pi bhavati sukhī hi sukhe tṛpyan duḥkhī dviṣan madhyastho na bhavati /
analyzed: atas eva a triguṇa tvāt madhyasthaḥ bhavati sukhī hi sukhe tṛpyan duḥkhī dviṣan madhyasthaḥ na bhavati
ā atas eva ubhaya rāhityāt udāsīnaḥ iti ucyate
evam aprasava dharmi tāt akartā pi

original: yadyapi cetano 'haṃ karomīti kṛticaitanyayoraikādhikaraṇyaṃ pratīyate tathāpi puruṣapradhānādisambandhātpuruṣacaitanyamavyakte guṇakartṛtvaṃ  #
analyzed: yadi api cetanaḥ ham karomi iti kṛti caitanyayoḥ aika adhikaraṇyam pratīyate tathā api puruṣa pradhāna ādi sambandhāt puruṣa caitanyam avyakte guṇa kartṛ tvam
ca puruṣe upacaryate

original: bhogyaṃ hi pradhānaṃ bhoktāramantareṇa na saṃbhavati iti bhavati tasya bhoktrapekṣā
analyzed: bhogyam hi pradhānam bhoktāram antareṇa na saṃbhavati iti bhavati tasya bhoktṛ apekṣā

original: puruṣastu bhogyena pradhānena saṃyuktastadgataṃ duḥkhamātmanyabhimanyamānaḥ kaivalyaṃ prārthayate /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tu bhogyena pradhānena saṃyuktaḥ tad gatam duḥkham ātmani abhimanyamānaḥ kaivalyam prārthayate

original: tacca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātinibandhanam na ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiḥ pradhānamantareṇeti
analyzed: tat ca sattva puruṣa anya tā khyāti nibandhanam na ca sattva puruṣa anya tā khyātiḥ pradhānam antareṇa iti

original: kaivalyārthaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānamapekṣata iti tayoḥ saṃyogaḥ ata eva saṃyogo na mahadādisargamantareṇa
analyzed: kaivalya artham puruṣaḥ pradhānam apekṣate iti tayoḥ saṃyogaḥ atas eva saṃyogaḥ na mahat ādi sargam antareṇa

original: bhogāya kaivalyāya ca paryāpta iti saṃyoga eva bhogāpavargārthaṃ sargaṃ karotīti //
analyzed: bhogāya kaivalyāya ca paryāptaḥ iti saṃyogaḥ eva bhoga apavarga artham sargam karoti iti
atha viveka jñāna upayoginī buddhiḥ nirūpyate
tasyāḥ ca vyāpāraḥ dhyavasāyaḥ tad abhinnaḥ
eṣa buddheḥ lakṣaṇam samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaka tvāt

original: tathāhi sarvo 'pi vyavahartā 'hamatrādhikṛta iti abhimatya mayā etatkartavyamiti adhyavasyati tataśca pravartate /
analyzed: tathā hi sarvaḥ pi vyavahartā ham atra adhikṛtaḥ iti abhimatya mayā etat kartavyam iti adhyavasyati tatas ca pravartate

original: tatra citisannidhānādāpannacaitanyāyā buddheryo 'yaṃ kartavyamiti viniśayayaḥ so 'dhyavasāyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra citi sannidhānāt āpanna caitanyāyāḥ buddheḥ yaḥ yam kartavyam iti saḥ dhī avasāyaḥ
tatra dharmaḥ yāga ādi anuṣṭhāna janitaḥ
jñānam guṇa puruṣa anya tā khyātiḥ
vairāgyam rāga abhāvaḥ
evam aiśvaryam api buddhi dharmaḥ yatas ṇima ādi prādurbhāvaḥ

original: ahamatra śaktaḥ matto nānyo 'trādhikṛtaḥ ato 'hamasmi ityādiko yo 'bhimānaḥ so 'haṅkāravyāpāratvādahaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: aham atra śaktaḥ mattaḥ na anyaḥ tra adhikṛtaḥ atas ham asmi iti ādikaḥ yaḥ bhimānaḥ saḥ haṅkāra vyāpāra tvāt ahaṅkāraḥ

original: tamupajīvya hi buddhiradhyavasyati karttavyametanmayeti ahaṅkārācca dvividhaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikādekādaśendriyāṇi tāmasāttu pañcatanmātrāḥ /
analyzed: tam upajīvya hi buddhiḥ adhyavasyati karttavyam etat mayā iti ahaṅkārāt ca dvividhaḥ sargaḥ sāttvikāt ekādaśa indriyāṇi tāmasāt tu pañca tanmātrāḥ
rajasaḥ tu tad pravartaka tva mātrāt kāraṇa tvam
sāttvika rājasa tāmasa ahaṅkārāṇām eva krameṇa vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ bhūtādiḥ iti saṃjñāḥ
cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa rasana tvac ākhyāni buddhīndriyāṇi
vāc pāṇi pāda pāyu upasthāni karmendriyāṇi
manaḥ ubhaya ātmakam buddhīndriyam karmendriyam ca
cakṣuḥ ādīnām ca manaḥ dhiṣṭhitānām sva viṣayeṣu pravṛtteḥ
prathamam bāla mūka ādi vat nirvikalpa ātmakam sāmānyataḥ jñānam utpadyate

original: paścācca vastudhamairjātyādibhiryo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa saṅkalpākhyo manaso vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: paścāt ca vastu dhamaiḥ jāti ādibhiḥ yaḥ dhī avasāyaḥ sa saṅkalpa ākhyaḥ manasaḥ vyāpāraḥ

original: ekasmādahaṅkārādekādaśavidhāni indriyāṇi bhavantītyatra tu śabdādyupabhogasampravartakādṛṣṭabheda eva niyāmakaḥ /
analyzed: ekasmāt ahaṅkārāt ekādaśavidhāni indriyāṇi bhavanti iti atra tu śabda ādi upabhoga sampravartaka adṛṣṭa bhedaḥ eva niyāmakaḥ
adṛṣṭa bhedaḥ tu guṇa pariṇāmaḥ eva

original: pañcabuddhīndriyāṇāṃ sambaddhavastvālocanaṃ vṛttiḥ vāgādikarmendriyāṇāṃ tu vacanādayo vṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: pañca buddhīndriyāṇām sambaddha vastu ālocanam vṛttiḥ vāc ādi karmendriyāṇām tu vacana ādayaḥ vṛttayaḥ

original: evaṃ mahato 'dhyavasāyaḥ ahaṅkārasyābhimānaḥ saṅkalpo manaso vṛttirvyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: evam mahataḥ dhī avasāyaḥ ahaṅkārasya abhimānaḥ saṅkalpaḥ manasaḥ vṛttiḥ vyāpāraḥ
kārya karaṇa abhimukhānām karaṇānām vṛtti saṅkaraḥ tu na bhavati

original: yathāhi parāvaskandāya pravṛttāḥ śāktīkayāṣṭīkādayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ śaktyādikamevādadate na parasparayaṣṭyādikam /
analyzed: yathā hi para avaskandāya pravṛttāḥ svam svam śakti ādikam eva ādadate na paraspara yaṣṭi ādikam

original: nanu yāṣṭīkānāṃ cetanatvādastu tathā pravṛttiḥ karaṇānāṃ tvacetanānāṃ pravṛtterayuktatvāttatsvarūpasāmarthyopabhogābhijña
analyzed: nanu yāḥ ṭīkānām cetana tvāt astu tathā pravṛttiḥ karaṇānām tu acetanānām pravṛtteḥ ayukta tvāt tad svarūpa sāmarthya upabhoga abhijña

original: adhiṣṭhātā svīkārya iti cenna tatpravṛttau puruṣārthasya hetutvāt etaccopapādayiṣyati /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhātā svīkāryaḥ iti ced na tad pravṛttau puruṣa arthasya hetu tvāt etat ca upapādayiṣyati
karaṇāni tu trayodaśa

original: karaṇatvaṃ tu śabdasparśādiprakāśanaṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ tu vacanādivyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: karaṇa tvam tu śabda sparśa ādi prakāśanam karmendriyāṇām tu vacana ādi vyāpāraḥ
etat bāhyakaraṇam varttamāna kālam antaṣkaraṇam tu tri kālam

original: nadīpūrabhedādabhūdvṛṣṭiḥ asti dhūmādihāgniḥ pipīlikāṇḍasaṃcaraṇādbhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiriti pratyayāt /
analyzed: nadīpūra bhedāt abhūt vṛṣṭiḥ asti dhūmāt iha agniḥ pipīlika aṇḍa saṃcaraṇāt bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiḥ iti pratyayāt
ye tu vaiśeṣikāḥ kālam ekam atiriktam svīkurvate

original: tanmate 'pyatītānāgatādivyavahārabhedaḥ upādhibhedādeva bhavati evaṃ ca taistairupādhibhirevātītānāgatādibhedasiddhau kimatiriktakālasvīkāreṇeti  #
analyzed: tad mate pi atīta anāgata ādi vyavahāra bhedaḥ upādhi bhedāt eva bhavati evam ca taiḥ taiḥ upādhibhiḥ eva atīta anāgata ādi bheda siddhau kim atirikta kāla svīkāreṇa iti
sāṃkhyāḥ
eṣām ca indriyāṇām pradhāna apradhāna bhāvaḥ

original: yathāhi grāmādhyakṣā karṣakādibhyaḥ karamādāya viṣayādhyakṣāya prayacchanti viṣayādhyakṣaśca
analyzed: yathā hi grāma adhyakṣā karṣaka ādibhyaḥ karam ādāya viṣaya adhyakṣāya prayacchanti viṣaya adhyakṣaḥ ca

original: sarvādhyakṣāya sa ca bhūpataye evaṃ bāhyendriyāṇyālocya manase samarpayanti manaśca
analyzed: sarva adhyakṣāya sa ca bhūpataye evam bāhya indriyāṇi ālocya manase samarpayanti manaḥ ca
saṅkalpya ahaṅkārāya ahaṅkāraḥ ca abhimatya buddhau sarva adhyakṣāyām iti

original: ete ca buddhīndriyamanohaṅkārā guṇaviśeṣā guṇānāṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ vikārāḥ parasparaṃ
analyzed: ete ca buddhīndriya manaḥ haṅkārāḥ guṇa viśeṣāḥ guṇānām sattva rajaḥ tamasām vikārāḥ parasparam

original: viruddhāṃ api puruṣārthenaikavākyatāpannāḥ yathā santamasāpanayanena prakāśāya militā
analyzed: viruddhām api puruṣa arthena ekavākya tā āpannāḥ yathā santamasā apanayanena prakāśāya militā
varti taila vahnayaḥ pradīpaḥ bhavati

original: nanu kasmādbuddhau prayacchanti na punarahaṅkārāya manase veti cenna puruṣārthasya prayojakatayā sākṣātsādhanaṃ pradhānaṃ buddhireva ahaṅkārādayastu  #
analyzed: nanu kasmāt buddhau prayacchanti na punar ahaṅkārāya manase vā iti ced na puruṣa arthasya prayojaka tayā sākṣāt sādhanam pradhānam buddhiḥ eva ahaṅkāra ādayaḥ tu
tam prati gauṇāḥ

original: asmadādibhiḥ parasparavyāvṛttāni nānubhūyante iti śabdāditanmātrāṇi aviśeṣāḥ sūkṣmāṇi ca /
analyzed: asmat ādibhiḥ paraspara vyāvṛttāni na anubhūyante iti śabda ādi tanmātrāṇi aviśeṣāḥ sūkṣmāṇi ca

original: ākāśādiṣu tu sthūleṣu kvacitsattvapradhānatayā śāntāḥ sukhāḥ prasannā laghavaḥ kecidrajastamaḥpradhānatayā ghorā mūḍhāśca /
analyzed: ākāśa ādiṣu tu sthūleṣu kvacid sattva pradhāna tayā śāntāḥ sukhāḥ prasannāḥ laghavaḥ kecid rajaḥ tamaḥ pradhāna tayā ghorāḥ mūḍhāḥ ca

original: te viśeṣāḥ punaḥ tridhā sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ mātāpitṛjaṃ mahābhūtāni ca /
analyzed: te viśeṣāḥ punar tridhā sūkṣmam śarīram mātā pitṛ jam mahābhūtāni ca
pradhānena ādisarge pratipuruṣam ekaikam utpāditam tathā vyāhatam śilām api anupraviśati
sargāt ā mahāpralayam avatiṣṭhate sūkṣmam śarīram tat ca mahat ahaṅkāra ekādaśa indriya pañca tanmātra samudāyaḥ

original: etacca śarīraṃ bhogānarha iti sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ ṣāṭkauśikamāśrayati /
analyzed: etat ca śarīram bhoga anarhaḥ iti sthūlam śarīram ṣāṭkauśikam āśrayati

original: lomalohitamāṃsāni mātṛtaḥ snāyvasthimajjānaḥ pitṛta iti ṣaṭ kośāḥ /
analyzed: loma lohita māṃsāni mātṛtaḥ snāyu asthi majjānaḥ pitṛtaḥ iti ṣaṭ kośāḥ

original: nanu dharmādharmanimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ tasya ca sūkṣmaśarīre 'bhāvātkathaṃ sthūlaśarīrāśrayaṇamiti
analyzed: nanu dharma adharma nimittaḥ saṃsāraḥ tasya ca sūkṣmaśarīre bhāvāt katham sthūlaśarīra āśrayaṇam iti

original: cet na dharmādyanvitabuddhyā saṃyogena tasyāpi dharmādyabhivāsitatvāt yathāhi surabhipuṣpādisambandhādvastramapi
analyzed: ced na dharma ādi anvita buddhyā saṃyogena tasya api dharma ādi abhivāsita tvāt yathā hi surabhi puṣpa ādi sambandhāt vastram api
tad āmoda vāsitam bhavati

original: dharmādharmādinimittakaṃ ca sthūlaśarīragrahaṇaṃ tayoḥ saṃsargeṇa sūkṣmaśarīraṃ sthūlaśarīramāśritya devo vā manuṣyo vā paśurvā bhavati /
analyzed: dharma adharma ādi nimittakam ca sthūlaśarīra grahaṇam tayoḥ saṃsargeṇa sūkṣmaśarīram sthūlaśarīram āśritya devaḥ vā manuṣyaḥ vā paśuḥ vā bhavati

original: yathāhi naṭastāṃ bhūmikāma vidhāya dharmarājo vā bhavati vatsarājo vā bhavati iti /
analyzed: yathā hi naṭaḥ tām bhūmi kāma vidhāya dharma rājaḥ vā bhavati vatsa rājaḥ vā bhavati iti
hetuḥ tu atra puruṣa arthaḥ eva
tatra ūrdhva gamanasya nimittam dharmaḥ
evam adharmeṇa adhogatiḥ
jñānena mokṣaḥ jñānena bandhaḥ

original: tattvānabhijñasya puruṣasya vairāgyamātrātprakṛtyādiṣvātmabudhyopāsyamāneṣu tatraiva layaḥ rāgātsaṃsāraḥ aiśvaryādicchāyā avighātaḥ vighātaścānaiśvaryāt
analyzed: tattva anabhijñasya puruṣasya vairāgya mātrāt prakṛti ādiṣu ātma budhyā upāsyamāneṣu tatra eva layaḥ rāgāt saṃsāraḥ aiśvaryāt icchāyāḥ avighātaḥ vighātaḥ ca anaiśvaryāt
ayam buddhi sargaḥ caturdhā viparyaya aśakti tuṣṭi siddhi bhedāt
tatra viparyayaḥ jñānam avidyā
viparyayaḥ pañcadhā avidyā asmitā rāga dveṣa abhiniveśāḥ yathā saṃkhyam tamaḥ moha mahāmoha tāmisra andhatāmisra saṃjñā bhedāt
prakṛti ādiṣu anātmasu ātma buddhiḥ avidyā tamaḥ
deva ādīnām aṇida ādi aiśvaryeṣu smitā mohaḥ
śabda ādiṣu viṣayeṣu rāgaḥ āsaktiḥ mahā mohaḥ
deva ādīnām asura ādibhyaḥ sva aiśvarya aṇima abhighāta bhayam abhiniveśaḥ ndhatāmisraḥ
aśaktiḥ tu andha tva paṅgu tva ādi rūpā karaṇa vaikalya hetukā

original: tuṣṭayo dvedhā ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca prakṛtivyatirikta ātmāstīti niścitya saṃnyāsādeva
analyzed: tuṣṭayaḥ dvedhā ādhyātmikāḥ bāhyāḥ ca prakṛti vyatiriktaḥ ātmā asti iti niścitya saṃnyāsāt eva

original: tavāpavarto bhaviṣyatīti upadeśādau yā tuṣṭayastā ādhyātmikyaḥ pañcaviṣayoparamāt
analyzed: tava apavartaḥ bhaviṣyati iti upadeśa ādau yāḥ tuṣṭayaḥ tāḥ ādhyātmikyaḥ pañca viṣaya uparamāt
yāḥ tuṣṭayaḥ tāḥ bāhyāḥ
ātma vidyānām adhyayana manana ādayaḥ siddhi bhedāḥ
evam nirūpitaḥ buddhi sargaḥ
tanmātra sargaḥ pi deva manuṣya paśu ādi bhedāt bahudhā
tatra ūrdhva adhas madhya lokāḥ sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ bahulāḥ

original: nanu sukhaduḥkhādayaḥ prākṛtā buddhiguṇāḥ kathaṃ cetane bhavantīti cetsatyam puri liṅge śerate sa puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: nanu sukha duḥkha ādayaḥ prākṛtāḥ buddhi guṇāḥ katham cetane bhavanti iti ced satyam puri liṅge śerate sa puruṣaḥ
evam ca liṅga puruṣayoḥ sambandhāt liṅga dharmān ātmani adhyavasyati
ayam ca mahat ādi
pṛthivī ādi mahābhūta antaḥ sargaḥ prakṛtyā eva kṛtaḥ

original: niṣkāraṇatve tu sadaiva syānnaiva vā syāt /
analyzed: niṣkāraṇa tve tu sadā eva syāt na eva vā syāt
īśvaraḥ tu na tatra upādānam citi śakteḥ apariṇāmāt
nā api īśvara dhiṣṭhitāyāḥ prakṛteḥ kartṛ tvam
nahi nirvyāpāraḥ takṣā vāsyā ādi adhitiṣṭhati

original: nanu prakṛteḥ kartṛtve tasyā nityatvenānuparamātkadāpi mokṣo na syāditi cenna /
analyzed: nanu prakṛteḥ kartṛ tve tasyāḥ nitya tvena anuparamāt kadāpi mokṣaḥ na syāt iti ced na

original: yathā hi odanakāmaḥ pakvaudano na pravartate punastatra evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛtirmocitavatī na taṃ prati punaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: yathā hi odana kāmaḥ pakva odanaḥ na pravartate punar tatra evam yam yam puruṣam prakṛtiḥ mocitavatī na tam prati punar pravartate

original: nanvacetanāyāṃ prakṛtau kathaṃ cetanadharmaḥ pravṛttiḥ tasmādasti prakṛteradhiṣṭhātā
analyzed: nanu acetanāyām prakṛtau katham cetana dharmaḥ pravṛttiḥ tasmāt asti prakṛteḥ adhiṣṭhātā
cetanaḥ ātmānaḥ tu prakṛti svarūpa anabhijña tvāt na adhiṣṭhātum arhanti tasmāt asti sarva artha darśī

original: prakṛteradhiṣṭhātā sa ceśvara eveti cetsatyam yathāhi vatvavivṛddhyarthamacetanamapi
analyzed: prakṛteḥ adhiṣṭhātā sa ca īśvaraḥ evā iti ced satyam yathā hi vatva vivṛddhi artham acetanam api

original: kṣīraṃ pravartate tathā prakṛtirapi puruṣamokṣāya pravartiṣyate /
analyzed: kṣīram pravartate tathā prakṛtiḥ api puruṣa mokṣāya pravartiṣyate
na ca īśvara adhiṣṭhāna tvena kṣīre pravṛttiḥ śaṅkayā

original: dvidhā hi pravṛttirbhavati svārthāya kāruṇyāya vā /
analyzed: dvidhā hi pravṛttiḥ bhavati sva arthāya kāruṇyāya vā

original: na cāptasakalakāmasyeśvarasya kimapi prārthanīyamasti sargātprāk duḥkhābhāvena karuṇāyā asaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: na ca āpta sakala kāmasya īśvarasya kim api prārthanīyam asti sargāt prāk duḥkha abhāvena karuṇāyāḥ asaṃbhavāt

original: kiñca karuṇayā prerita īśvaraḥ sukhina eva sarvān prāṇinaḥ sṛjet na vicitrān /
analyzed: kiñca karuṇayā prerita īśvaraḥ sukhinaḥ eva sarvān prāṇinaḥ sṛjet na vicitrān

original: prakṛtestvacetanatayā nedaṃ dvayaṃ kintu parārthaiva pravṛttiḥ yathā pāriṣadānpradarśayannivartate naṭaḥ evaṃ prakṛtiḥ ātmānaṃ śabdādyātmanā  #
analyzed: prakṛteḥ tu acetana tayā na idam dvayam kintu parārthā eva pravṛttiḥ yathā pāriṣadān pradarśayan nivartate naṭaḥ evam prakṛtiḥ ātmānam śabda ādi ātmanā
puruṣāt bhedena prakāśya nivartate

original: phalābhāve 'pi nirguṇe upakāriṇyapi puruṣe prakṛtistapasvinī pravartate eva yathāhi guṇavānupakāryapi bhṛtyo nirguṇe upakāriṇyapi svāmini niṣphalārādhanaḥ
analyzed: phala abhāve nirguṇe upakāriṇi api puruṣe prakṛtiḥ tapasvinī pravartate eva yathā hi guṇavān upakārī api bhṛtyaḥ nirguṇe upakāriṇi api svāmini niṣphala ārādhanaḥ

original: yadyapi nāṭyānnivṛtto 'pi naṭaḥ kālāntare punarapi pravartate evaṃ muktaṃ prati prakṛtistu
analyzed: yadi api nāṭyāt nivṛttaḥ naṭaḥ kāla antare punar api pravartate evam muktam prati prakṛtiḥ tu

original: na punaḥ pravartate yathāhi vigalitavasanā kulavadhūḥ kadācitkenaciddṛṣṭā cettadāsau
analyzed: na punar pravartate yathā hi vigalita vasanā kula vadhūḥ kadācid kenacid dṛṣṭā ced tadā asau

original: tathā yatate yathā na puruṣāntarāṇi paśyanti evaṃ prakṛtirapi vivekena sākṣātkṛtā
analyzed: tathā yatate yathā na puruṣa antarāṇi paśyanti evam prakṛtiḥ api vivekena sākṣātkṛtā
ti lajjā vaśāt punar sva ātmānam na pradarśayati

original: nanu savāsanakleśakarmāśayānāṃ bandhanasaṃjñitānāmapyapariṇāmini puruṣe 'sambhavātkathaṃ mokṣaḥ mucerbandhanaviśleṣārthatvāt /
analyzed: nanu sa vāsana kleśa karma āśayānām bandhana saṃjñitānām api apariṇāmini puruṣe sambhavāt katham mokṣaḥ muceḥ bandhana viśleṣa ārtha tvāt

original: ata eva na saṃsāro 'pi sambhavati niṣkriyatvāt /
analyzed: atas eva na saṃsāraḥ u pi sambhavati niṣkriya tvāt
mā evam

original: yathāhi bhṛtyagatau jayaparājayau svāminyupacaryete evaṃ prakṛtigatayorapi bhogāpavargayorvivekāgrahātpuruṣe upacāraḥ /
analyzed: yathā hi bhṛtya gatau jaya parājayau svāmini upacaryete evam prakṛti gatayoḥ api bhoga apavargayoḥ viveka agrahāt puruṣe upacāraḥ
tatra dharma adharma ajñāna vairāgya avairāgya aiśvarya anaiśvarya rūpaiḥ saptabhiḥ bhāvaiḥ badhnāti tattva jñānena tu mocayati

original: evaṃ ca kṛtādasmāttattvābhyāsānnāsmi na me nāhamiti śuddhamutpadyate jñānaṃ yadviṣayo abhyāsastaṃ sākṣātkārayatīti /
analyzed: evam ca kṛtāt asmāt tattva abhyāsāt na asmi na me na aham iti śuddham utpadyate jñānam yad viṣayaḥ abhyāsaḥ tam sākṣātkārayati iti
na asmi iti anena asteḥ kriyā artha tvāt

original: nāhamityanena kartṛtvaṃ na me ityanena svāmitvaṃ niṣidhyate /
analyzed: na aham iti anena kartṛ tvam na me iti anena svāmi tvam niṣidhyate

original: bhogavivekasākṣātkārau prakṛteḥ prasotavyau tau ca prasūtāviti nivṛttā prakṛtistāṃ
analyzed: bhoga viveka sākṣātkārau prakṛteḥ prasotavyau tau ca prasūtau iti nivṛttā prakṛtiḥ tām
niṣkriyaḥ su accha puruṣaḥ paśyati prakṛti puruṣayoḥ a saṃsarge pi a viveka khyāti nibandhanaḥ
saṃsāraḥ punarna bhavati iti

original: ante tattvajñānasya tadānīmeva śarīrapātastu na bhavati /
analyzed: ante tattva jñānasya tadānīm eva śarīrapātaḥ tu na bhavati

original: yathāhi nivṛtte kulālavyāpāre saṃskāravaśāt cakraṃ bhramattiṣṭhati evaṃ saṃskāravaśāt
analyzed: yathā hi nivṛtte kulāla vyāpāre saṃskāra vaśāt cakram bhramat tiṣṭhati evam saṃskāra vaśāt

original: śarīramapi śarīrapātānantaraṃ tu pradhānasya nivṛttatvādātyantikamapi duḥkhaṃ naśyati
analyzed: śarīram api śarīra pāta anantaram tu pradhānasya nivṛtta tvāt ātyantikam api duḥkham naśyati
duḥkha abhāva rūpam kaivalyam āpnoti
iti śrīmat devīdatta ātmaja gama sevaka sūnu ācārya kṛṣṇamitra kṛtā tattvamīmāṃsā samāptā
